title: A hyue full of hunnye contayning the firste booke of Moses, called Genesis. Turned into English meetre, by VVilliam Hunnis, one of the Gent. of her Maiesties Chappel, and Maister to the Children of the same. Seene and allowed, accordinge to the order appointed.
author: Hunnis, William, d. 1597.
publicationStmtPublisher: In Fleetstreete, neere vnto Sainct Dunstanes Church, by Thomas Marsh,
